field.name: description
field.value:
Build of Castle.MonoRail.ViewComponents throw exception like:
Error 3 The best overloaded method match for 'Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AbstractHelper.SetController(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Controller)' has some invalid arguments D:\a\_SVN\CastleContrib\viewcomponents\Castle.MonoRail.ViewComponents\CaptchaComponent.cs 310 4 Castle.MonoRail.ViewComponents
This error due to the refactoring of IFilter to accept IController when Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Helpers.AbstractHelper.SetController(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Controller) is not aware of the change.
